report.title: Rolling Over and Over
report.author: DT1401
report.bodytext: I ordered a gram of Salvia Divinorum 60x online a few weeks ago. Well today I decided to try it. I smoked a bowl of it. At first I was thinking well this is not really doing anything. So I smoked some more. The I felt like I was rolling over and over. Faster and faster. I can't say I saw any visuals other than distance was really hard to judge and I could not think. All I could think of I want this to stop. It seemed to take forever. Finally I started to sober up then my head hurt really bad. I picked up the pipe and what was left and put it in the trash. /n /n I don't want to do anymore of that stuff for the rest of my life. I have done shrooms,Ketamine, and LSD once. However its been along time, but this is nothing like that.
